text: __NOTOC__ John "Jackie" Maloney (1896–1971) was an American football and college basketball coach. He served as the head football coach at Georgetown University in 1923, compiling a record of 3–6. After coaching the school′s freshman basketball team, he also served as its head varsity basketball coach during the 1922–23 season after John O'Reilly, the Georgetown varsity basketball coach from 1914 to 1921, was unable to coach due to illness for a second straight season. During his single season as the varsity basketball coach before O'Reilly returned, Maloney tallied a mark of 8–3. ==Head coaching record== ===Football=== ===Basketball=== ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1971 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Georgetown Hoyas football coaches Category:Georgetown Hoyas football players Category:Georgetown Hoyas men's basketball coaches
title: Jackie Maloney
